title: Android app deals of the day: Klocki, ProShot, Swiftly Switch Pro, Travel Tracker Pro, and more
content:
Today’s Android game and app deals have now been organized for you down below. Just be sure to check out this morning’s rare one-day price drop on Google Pixel 5 handsets with a new all-time low price at $450 and Samsung’s latest Galaxy A53 5G. Today’s app collection is headlined by titles such as GPS Speed Pro, Swiftly switch – Pro, Klocki, Star Chindy: Space Roguelike, ProShot, Travel Tracker Pro, and more. Hit the jump for a complete look at today’s best Android app deals courtesy of Google Play. 

more…
